document.masterDocTitle: Larval descriptions of Rhacophorus bipunctatus and Xenophrys serchhipii from Northeast India

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Larval descriptions of Rhacophorus bipunctatus and Xenophrys serchhipii from Northeast India

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Department of Zoology, Mizoram University, Aizawl, Mizoram, India. https: // orcid. org / 0000 - 0002 - 3080 - 8647

subSubSection.paragraph:
Buccopharyngeal morphology (Stage 38).
Buccal roof diamond shaped ( Fig. 2A ); prenarial arena with spherical grouped protuberances arranged in a T-shape. Internal nares elliptical and oriented at 90° of the transversal plan; narial projections present near the inner ends and extended anteromedially. A pair of elongated papillae arranged in the postnarial arena. Median ridge semicircular with irregular margin and 1–2 protrusions on its frontal edge. Lateral ridge papilla on each side of median ridge, with irregular, postulate margin. Some tiny papillae distributed in the roof arena among disperse pustulations. Buccal roof arena delineated by seven pairs of buccal roof arena papillae; few small pustulations scattered randomly in the buccal roof arena. Narrow glandular zone along the posterior portion of the buccal roof; dorsal velum smooth and continuous. Buccal floor triangular ( Fig. 2B ). Prelingual area of the buccal floor composed of four pairs of infralabial papillae located along the corner and medial region of the area; two at the anterolateral corner, the third at the posterolateral corner and the fourth pair of pustulate tubular papillae located postero-medially between the two posterior pairs. The third pair includes bifurcate papillae. Tongue anlage round, with two pustulate lingual papillae placed medially. Buccal floor arena surrounded by 12 buccal floor arena papillae on each side that are curved with pointed tips; buccal floor arena mostly smooth with about 12–14 pustulations placed irregularly on each side; buccal floor arena papillae start out lateral to the buccal pocket and continue along the postero-lateral area on each side of the arena. Buccal pockets are obliquely arranged. Ventral velum wide and sinuate; margin of the velum with four projections on each side. Glottis exposed, posterior to the ventral velum.
